entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain or snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
